ai-cp6:1.1_0: “I’m not ever to ask for a question,
ai-cp6:2.3_0: There I rolled forth my gift.
ai-cp6:3.2_0: the food and drink that she consumes—
ai-cp6:3.3_0: should take care of the mind,
ai-cp6:3.4_0: taught the Great Bodhi (Tree) with great wisdom.
ai-cp6:4.1_0: Even as I associate with a regular ocher;
ai-cp6:4.2_0: of wealth, for the sake of gain,
ai-cp6:4.3_0: by way of body, speech, or mind.
ai-cp6:5.3_0: by giving gifts, after causing them,
ai-cp6:5.4_0: I want to see the supreme awakening.”
